metadata.synopsis: Two aging St. Tropez homosexuals (Ugo Tognazzi, Michel Serrault) unwittingly have the microfilm a spy ring wants.

reviews: After monstrosities like Cruising and Windows, it's a delight to see an upbeat gay movie with loveable characters and a happy ending.
O roteiro preguioso jamais consegue explorar com inteligncia as prprias situaes que cria.
Les Cages Aux Folles II is a barrel of laughs.
